author: mbautin
msg: HServerInfo serialization was changed in HBASE-6508. This broke
compatibility with HBase clients that aretrieve cluster status. This
patch allows clients and server to disable sending the last flushed
sequence id field of serverInfo when it is not necessary, restoring
backwards compatibility between clients and servers.
1. Test communication between new client and old server
2. Test communication between old client and new server

author: olamy
msg: move scmsvnpub plugin configuration to parent pom

author: olamy
msg: move scmsvnpub plugin configuration to parent pom

author: mbautin
msg: [HBASE-6583] Create a CF if its not present in the load test tool
Summary: The load test tool used to error out with an NPE if the CF is not present. This patch will add the CF.
Test Plan: Tested against a table on the new shadow
